posts.post_content: This is legal in tournaments. You are alowed to have 60+ cards in a deck, the only requirment is you can shuffel your deck. Of course since your only allowed 4 of these the real challenge is to have 200+ cards and still be able to play this before you drop below 200. There is so much flavor here but it is a card you have to build everything around.
